Answers.AnswerText: It is an open source integrated development environment for Linux, OS X, and Windows. Its primary focus is development of projects that use Mono and .NET frameworks
It is a company founded by the engineers who created Mono. It provides professional developer tools that make cross platform code easier to author, test, and maintain

It is a framework and an open source implementation of Microsoft’s .NET Framework based on the open standards of European Computer Manufacturer's Association for the C# language and the Common Language Runtime

Questions.Description: Xamarin is a Microsoft-owned San Francisco, California based software company founded in May 2011 by the engineers that created Mono, Mono for Android and MonoTouch

Questions.QuestionText: What is correct about Xamarin history?

Answers.AnswerText: Xamarin 4.0 was released in February 2012 Xamarin.Android and Xamarin.iOS that make it possible to do native Android, iOS and Windows development in C#, with either Visual Studio or Xamarin Studio
Xamarin.Forms introduced in Xamarin 3 on May 28, 2014 and allows one to use portable controls subsets that are mapped to native controls of Android, iOS and Windows Phone

Questions.Description: Intoduction of Xamarin.Forms on May 28, 2014 is correct. It id an API that allows quickly build native apps for iOS, Android and Windows completely in C# with over 96% code sharing across platforms

Questions.QuestionText: Windows Azure platform consists of which three main components?

Answers.AnswerText: Active Directory, virtual machines and Windows OS

Questions.Description: According to Windows expert Johnathan Hassell, Windows Azure consists of three main components: the fabric, a network of all the Microsoft machines running the Azure platform; the storage - tables, queries, queues and binary large objects (BLOBs) as well as Windows Azure Drives; and APIs and SDK, or the development layer

Questions.QuestionText: What other Microsoft product is expected to provide the underpinnings of the Windows Azure platform as well as democratize high-availability clusters to push the scale-up envelope?
Questions.Description: In late 2011, Microsoft revealed the link between Azure and Windows Server 8, claiming the dynamic duo will balance cloud computing and virtualized high-availability infrastructures, offer improved storage capabilities and provide access to an Azure toolkit for developing and deploying an Azure public cloud service to end users

Questions.QuestionText: Which of the following converts a type to an unsigned int type in C#?
Questions.Description: ToUInt16() method converts a type to an unsigned int type

Questions.QuestionText: Which of the following is correct about variable naming conventions in C#?

Answers.AnswerText: A name must begin with a letter that could be followed by a sequence of letters, digits (0 - 9) or underscore
The first character in an identifier cannot be a digit

Questions.Description: Both of the above options are correct

Questions.QuestionText: Which of the following access specifier in C# allows a class to expose its member variables and member functions to other functions and objects in the current assembly?
Questions.Description: Internal access specifier allows a class to expose its member variables and member functions to other functions and objects in the current assembly.
